steps.title: Warm-up (5 minutes)
steps.description: Raise your heart rate and prep joints with simple, low-impact moves.

items.name: Marching in Place
items.context: Start easy, breathe through your nose if possible.

items.name: Dynamic Arm Circles
items.context: Small circles first, then bigger as shoulders loosen.

items.name: Hip Openers
items.context: Slow and controlled. Stop before pain.

steps.title: Strength A (Full body)
steps.description: A simple circuit you can repeat 2-3 times with good form.

items.name: Chair Squats
items.context: Use a chair as depth target. Keep knees tracking over toes.

items.name: Wall Push-ups
items.context: Move feet farther from the wall to increase difficulty.

items.name: Glute Bridges
items.context: Pause for 1 second at the top. Keep ribs down.

items.name: Bird Dogs
items.context: Slow reps. Keep hips level and core braced.

steps.title: Strength B (Bands or dumbbells)
steps.description: Optional equipment day. Keep it controlled and repeatable.

items.name: Resistance Bands (Light to Medium)
items.context: Choose tension that allows clean reps without shrugging.

items.name: Incline Rows (using sturdy furniture)
items.context: Pull elbows toward ribs. Stop if setup feels unstable.

items.name: Dumbbells (5-15 lbs)
items.context: Pick a weight you can control for 8-12 reps.

steps.title: Cool-down (5 minutes)
steps.description: Bring your breathing down and restore range of motion.

items.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
items.context: Move with your breath. Keep it gentle.

items.name: Foam Roller (for warm-up and recovery)
items.context: Light pressure. Avoid rolling directly on joints.
